Srivastava, Pradeep wrote:

> Thanks Eric for your suggestion while I had already tried redirecting the
> output to a text file, but it doesn't look quite convincing.

I would be interested to know why? What is unconvincing about doing 
something that people have done for decades?

> It would be helpful if you could send a sample ANT script for compiling and
> running tests.

The Ant manual provides all the examples you should need.
